name: whisky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a strong, pale brown alcoholic drink, originally from Scotland and Ireland, made from grain such as barley, maize, or rye
Examples
Some strong alcoholic drinks such as whisky are made by distilling.The whisky industry is campaigning for the taxes on different alcoholic drinks to be evened up.A manhattan contains whisky and vermouth.She likes her whisky neat.He sought oblivion in a bottle of whisky.
